about_the_game:
Handcrafted by a Ukrainian solo developer:



Wake up aboard a giant spaceship in this Sci-Fi Action-Puzzle FPS. With no recollection of your past, you are guided by a familiar voice claiming to be your friend.

Explore the Ship


Swarming with hostile robots, you must make your way through the vessel, looking for an escape. As you navigate through energy gateways and shifting corridors, a lingering sense of foreboding tells you that secrets lie not far beneath the surface.

Enhance and evolve your mechanical body


Your mission unfolds: As you venture through the ship, conquer the challenges that you face, and unearth your route to freedom, you find that you need to harness the potential of cybernetic enhancement. Seek out upgrade chips and learn to utilise them.

Mod your weapon


As you rove deeper, you realise that your enemies grow stronger. Equip your weapon with different mods to unlock its full potential. From a powerful laser beam to a hefty shotgun, customise your weapon to match your combat style.

Level editor (BETA)


Can’t get enough after finishing the game? Don’t worry — there’s more, thanks to the community. Create and share your own levels through the Steam Workshop!

Key Features:

- A captivating sci-fi adventure
- Hours of tense FPS action, puzzles, and boss fights
- Explore the stunning environments of the spaceship IHAS
- Navigate a seamless menu that won’t break your immersion
- Upgrade your weapon and mechanical body to adapt to the challenges ahead
- Connect with the community through the level editor, build, share and play brand new levels every day!
